verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We praise Thee, glorious Father, As objects of Thy grace, Who for Thine own heart’s pleasure Are now before Thy face: Thy sons marked out for glory Known from eternity With Christ Thy Well-beloved, Object supreme to Thee.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Who else but Thee, O Father, Could in Thine only Son So bless us with Thy Spirit, And have us for Thine own? Soon shall we be forever With Christ in glory; then We’ll shine in His blest image Eternally, Amen!{/lang-eng}
